title: I Am an Evil Sword - Novel Updates
tags: Artifact Crafting   Assassins   Cold Protagonist   Cultivation   Cunning Protagonist   Demonic Cultivation Technique   Evil Protagonist   Fast Cultivation   Generals   Magic Formations   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Military   Multiple Protagonists   Murders   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Politics   Reincarnated as an Object   Shameless Protagonist   Skill Assimilation   System Administrator   Unlucky Protagonist

description: I can’t help it, I feel like a magic sword, I can’t be emotional! My only hobby is killing people who cut me down, want to be my old man, and I can’t wash my hands before going to the toilet!>
